      Method parameters in <Unnamed> with type arguments of type TriggerLogicBlock 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> Service.addServiceToSystem(java.lang.String representation, java.util.ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock> triggerBlocks, java.util.ArrayList<Peripheral> peripherals)
      This method adds a service that follows a given representation to the system represented by a given ArrayList of TriggerLogicBlock objects.
      private static LogicBlock Service.addTriggerCombinationToSystem(java.lang.String triggerCombinations, java.util.ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock> triggerBlocks, java.util.ArrayList<Peripheral> peripherals, java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> serviceBlocks)
      This method adds LogicBlock objects that follow the interpretation of a set of triggerCombinations to the system represented by a given ArrayList of TriggerLogicBlock objects.
      void Service.deleteFromSystem(java.util.ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock> triggers)
      Removes this Service from the system which is given as an ArrayList of TriggerLogicBlock objects.
      boolean Service.editService(java.lang.String editedServiceRepresentation, java.util.ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock> triggers, java.util.ArrayList<Peripheral> peripherals)
      If the provided editedServiceRepresentation is not the same as the String representation of the logic of this Service, LogicBlock objects are added to or removed from this Service as necessary such that when this method completes this Service will be representable by editedServiceString.
      private static void Service.removeBlocks(java.util.ArrayList<TriggerLogicBlock> triggers, java.util.ArrayList<LogicBlock> blocksToDelete)
      Removes a specified list of logic blocks from a Service by calling the removeFromService method in the LogicBlock class.
